div.head: For varnishing
div.ab: Turpentine varnish does not need any glue because it is fatty & viscous & it is not absorbed in the wood like that of spike lavender & sandarac. Also, that of spike lavender does not require any glue on iron & similar things that do not absorb. But on wood & on colors which have do not have gum or distemper glue, it is necessary to lay one coat of the said hide glue & to let it dry & to varnish.
